snippet: Project Thunderdome, an ambitious effort to provide articles to 75 newsrooms owned by Digital First Media, will be shut down as the company looks to cut costs and focus on local news.
abstract: Digital First Media says it is shutting down Project Thunderdome, ambitious, centralized effort to provide national and foreign articles to the 75 newsrooms owned by the company; more than 50 people will lose their jobs, and more layoffs are likely.
lead_paragraph: Project Thunderdome, an ambitious effort to provide articles to 75 newsrooms owned by Digital First Media, will be shut down as the company looks to cut costs and focus on local news.

headline.main: Lofty Newspaper Project Is Closed After Two Years
headline.print_headline: Lofty Newspaper Project Is Closed After Two Years
